page.title: 06Conservation Near Woodsetts
page.content: {Anston Stones Wood}is important because it is{ancient woodland}where some{rare plants}grow.Some of the plants are{orchids}and{tooth-wort. {Anston Stones Wood}is shelter for a lot of{birds and animals}like badgers, foxes,rabbits.The birds might be owls mostly because owls normally live in woods.The owls are probably,Tawny owls and Little owls.The most common owl in Anston stones wood is probably the Tawny owl.In the old{quarry}at the bottom of {Lindrick Dale}there are bee and common spotted{orchids}and{glow worms.}These plants and animals are getting scarce because farmers spray their fields with{chemicals.
